gt_text: 你没有迟到 你正在路上 深呼吸，微笑，继续前行 快到了
juding_criteria:
Output from Part 2:

*   A bedroom mirror.
*   Multiple sticky notes on the mirror surface.
*   A sticky note positioned in the top left area of the mirror.
*   Legible Chinese text '你没有迟到' on the top left sticky note.
*   A sticky note positioned in the middle area of the mirror.
*   Legible Chinese text '你正在路上' on the middle sticky note.
*   A sticky note positioned in the bottom right area of the mirror.
*   Legible Chinese text '深呼吸，微笑，继续前行' on the bottom right sticky note.
*   A single crumpled sticky note on the floor.
*   Legible Chinese text '快到了' on the crumpled sticky note on the floor.
